sentences.sContent: Most domains fit into this model.
sentences.sCn: 大多数域符合这个模型。

sentences.sContent: "I know who I am and what I want in life, and know without a doubt children do not fit into that equation, " she said.
sentences.sCn: “我知道我是谁以及我想要什么样的生活，而且毫无疑问地知道孩子不适合那种关系，”她说。

sentences.sContent: This demonstrates how the code automatically adjusts the image to fit into the requested image.
sentences.sCn: 这展示了代码如何自动调整图像的大小来适合所请求的图像。
